attributes.review: I’ve had this app downloaded bc i love our BEAUTIFUL and INTELLIGENT leader. i love to support our very uncorrupt politician and millionaire businessman president in any way i can, including posting on facebook memes and fake news articles i get off this app. The app is so difficult to use though and become nearly impossible to find what i’m looking for.  my son knows how to use this app tho bc he’s 4. He got on the app one day when i want looking and donated $200 to our GLORIOUS president and now i donate all my money for my phone bill to Trump so support him each month. I was mad at first but i can not figure out how to end my subscription. This is now a problem because I can not get the messages for my phone because my service has been cut off for 6 months since I am unable to pay it. The app is basically unusable now. There are so many glitches and it’s making it very difficult to share the articles on there.  My phone has been weird as well. i’ve been getting spam emails every hour since i put in my email with this app and i cannot cancel those either without donating another $20 to Trump. I cannot buy food for my kids anymore and i cannot cancel my subscription with this app. biggest regret on my life this app ruined my life.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP ITS FRAUD

attributes.review: Couldn’t believe they made an app that featured garbage. Now my phone stinks because of the large much waste dumped on it. Bottom line, that smell that occurs after downloading this app isn’t from a new landfill near your home but is in fact trash spewing out of the mouth of a pumpkin. Please remove this app and get me some bleach to wash the stench from my hands. Disgusting, hate-fueled, entitled, piece of trash app.
attributes.title: Garbage
